96321.魔人たちは 次々と 海洋都市の住民を喰らい\n建物を破壊していった……。\n主と:
The fiends ate the citizens and destroyed many
buildings, one by one... My Lord and I fought
them with all our might.

96322.主の持つ 比類なき魔力の前に 魔人たちは\n次々と倒されていった。そして あと一:
The friends were wiped out by my Lord's
incredible magic, one by one. And just when I
had thought we'd beaten them all...

96323.中央塔の頂から 光があふれ 他を圧倒する\nまがまがしく強大な気配が 現れたのだ:
From the top of the central tower, a dazzling
light flooded the sky, emerging a powerful
presence. It roared, trembling the whole city.

96324.ふがいなくも 私は 衝撃で気を失ってしまい\n気が付いた時には 主の姿は どこに:
Unfortunately, I was knocked unconscious by the shock, and by the time I came to, my Lord was nowhere to be found. I rushed to the
tower, but it was empty.

96325.海洋都市リンジャハルは 生者のいない\n死の都と化していた。私は 町じゅうを\n:
The city of Linjahar had become a city for the
dead. I searched everywhere, but I couldn't
find any trace of my Lord.

96326.あの時 何が起きたのか……わからないが\n我が主が 簡単に 命を落とすとは思えな:
I still don't know exactly what happened... but I do know my Lord wouldn't have died so easily. It was then I decided to go out on a
journey to find him.

96327.これで私は この手記の 筆を置こうと思う。\n最も敬愛した人に ふたたび会える日:
And now, I shall end this journal. Until the
day I meet the one I cherish most dearly...
                  Ethene's Royal Squire, Faras

96335.「キ…… キサマハ……！？\n ソウカ！ ソウイウコトカ！！\n シギャアアアア:
Y... YOU?! I SEE, JUST AS I THOUGHT!!
GYAAAAAAAHHHHH!!!
